      Subinterfaces of IGuiNode in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IGuiPlace
      Sub type of IGuiNode for places in a IGuiModel (places with a "token" circle).
      interface  IGuiTransition
      Interface for transitions in a IGuiModel.
      Classes in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui that implement IGuiNode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GuiNode
      Superclass GuiNode implements the common members for all nodes.
      class  GuiPlace
      Implements the places for the GUI model of the Petri net.
      class  GuiTransition
      Implements the transitions for the GUI model of the Petri net.
      Fields in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui declared as IGuiNode 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IGuiNode GuiArc.pred
      The predecessor - the node that is the source of this arc
      private IGuiNode OverlayGuiArc.startNode
      The predecessor - the node that is the source of this arc

      Note: We need the IGuiNode as source of the arc because the anchor point of the arrow needs to have the same behavior as on the real drawing when the user moves the mouse over the draw panel.
      private IGuiNode GuiArc.succ
      The successor - the node that is the target of this arc
